name: GKSpheresNoiseSource
desc: A procedural noise generator whose output is a 3D field of concentric spherical shells.

items.name: init(frequency: Double)
items.desc: Initializes a sphere noise source with the specified frequency.

items.name: class func spheresNoise(withFrequency: Double) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a sphere noise source with the specified frequency.

items.name: var frequency: Double
items.desc: A value that determines the size and spacing of concentric spheres.
